item.title: Mango Salad
item.description: Difficulty: very easy Time: 15 minutes Ingredients (6 people): 4 Mangoes 2 Cucumbers 2 Red peppers 5x400g Canned Chickpeas Coriander Seasoning: 1 Lime White Wine Vinegar (or similar) Hemp oil, Olive oil (or similar) Salt Chili (powdered or chopped) Instructions: Peel and cut the mangoes and cucumbers into small pieces. Cut the red peppers into small pieces. Add the chickpeas, seasoning and chopped coriander, mix everything.
